display.title: Optional display name of the instance. This will be displayed instead of the domain name on other instances.

richRenderOnRemote.title: Rich display type of this instance on remote instances
richRenderOnRemote.description: When a remote instance uses rich rendering mode, this option specifies in which way your instance will be rendered.

richRenderEra.title: Rich display type for your instance
richRenderEra.description: When your instance uses rich rendering, this option specifies the style of an era in which your instance will be rendered.

sticker_path.title: Path to a sticker image file
sticker_path.description: Optional path, relative to the `link` field, specifying an image (sticker) that remote instances can display.

sticker_link.title: Link the sticker on other instances will point to
sticker_link.description: Optional link whereto the sticker will point when displayed on a remote instance. If left empty, the sticker will link to this evertide instance.

open.title: Whether to open this instance to federation.
open.description: This can be changed at any time, but keep in mind already linked instances will still be allowed to fetch.
